name: Beethoven: The Ultimate Canine Caper!
overview: At last, a game the entire family can howl over! Everyone's favorite St. Bernard has now got a family of his own! But being proud papa to four little pups sounds a lot easier than it really is - poor Beethoven's got his paws full! One minute the puppies are in the living room, the next they're... gone! Now you've got to help Beethoven find his kids before his sweetheart, Missy, discovers they're gone! Your search will take you all over town, through four worlds - with nothing but your keen canine sense of smell to sniff out your quarry. Filled with non-stop action, hilarious adventure and wild surprises, BEETHOVEN is one howling good time!
